#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,len,i,j,num;
	char str[10000],c;
	cin>>n;
	while(n--)
	{
	
		cin>>str;
		num=0;
		i=0;
		while(str[i])
		{
			if((str[i]-48)<3)
			{
				num=num+(str[i]-48)*100;
				num=num+(str[i+1]-48)*10;
				num=num+(str[i+2]-48);
				i=i+3;
				c=num;
				cout<<c;
				num=0;				
			}
			else
			{
				num=num+(str[i]-48)*10;
				num=num+(str[i+1]-48)*1;
				i=i+2;
				c=num;
				cout<<c;
				num=0;	
			}
			
			}	
			cout<<endl;
		
	}
}
